topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54eecac3636872115ad00a00#post_54eecac3636872115ad00a00
>you attempt to graze but carpet isn't very nutritious


"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54eecafc63687206410e1900#post_54eecafc63687206410e1900
> your continued attempts to touch the butt seem to anger the mysterious hollow voice 

> finally it says "HOLY SHIT STOP"

> after the outburst there is a sudden burst of smoke coming seemingly from nowhere

> you suddenly find yourself in an Alaskan field

> with real not carpet grass

> and a bunch of lady mooses

>also a bottomless pit in case you still want to do that dying thing

* congratulations you have achieved ending number 3: you are a moose *


"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54eecb00636872726e5c0700#post_54eecb00636872726e5c0700
> you stick your face under the dresser and attempt to negotiate with the spiders 

> one of them climbs up your nose

> and then another and another

> you can no longer breathe

> you pass out

* congratulations!(?) you have achieved ending number 79:you have died by spideruffocation *
